show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On Today’s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.
com and @alisonroselevy) will feature two leading activists.
In the first half of the program, Alison will speak with Barbara Arrindell (http://www.damascuscitizens.org/) the Co-Founder of Damascus Citizens for Sustainable Energy, and in the second half, Dr Helen Caldicott, MD ( http://www.helencaldicott.
com/ ) one of the world’s leading anti-nuclear educators and activists.
Both Helen Caldicott and Barbara Arrindell will present at the upcoming Green Festival in New York City on April 22, 2012.
Learn more at:http://www.greenfestivals.org/nyc/updates/
